security.title: Security
warning: OpenClaw is a hobby project and still in beta. Expect sharp edges.
This bot can read files and run actions if tools are enabled.
A bad prompt can trick it into doing unsafe things.
If you're not comfortable with basic security and access control, don't run OpenClaw.
Ask someone experienced to help before enabling tools or exposing it to the internet.
- Keep secrets out of the agent's reachable filesystem.
- Use the strongest available model for any bot with tools or untrusted inboxes.
security.confirmMessage: I understand this is powerful and inherently risky. Continue?

mode.title: Onboarding mode
mode.quickstartHint: Configure details later via openclaw configure.
mode.manualHint: Configure port, network, Tailscale, and auth options.
mode.quickstartRemoteNote: QuickStart only supports local gateways. Switching to Manual mode.

config.invalidMessage: Config invalid. Run `openclaw doctor` to repair it, then re-run onboarding.

setup.whatToSetup: What do you want to set up?

memory.title: Memory Setup
memory.noteExclusive: NOTE: Only one memory plugin can be active at a time.

core.name: Memory Core (built-in)
core.description: Memory Core is the built-in session memory system. No configuration needed.
core.switchQuestion: Switch to Memory Core (built-in session memory)?

neo4j.name: Neo4j Graph Memory
neo4j.title: Neo4j Memory Setup
description: This plugin provides graph-based memory with entity relationship extraction.
It stores memories in a Neo4j graph database for multi-hop search and context.
IMPORTANT: Only one memory plugin can be active at a time.
1. Create a new database or use an existing one
3. Use the username/password you set during database creation
connectionFailed: The configuration has been saved, but the plugin may not work correctly.
Please verify your Neo4j connection settings.
neo4j.connectionOk: Connection test successful! Neo4j memory plugin is ready to use.
neo4j.strategyHybridHint: Use quick model for extraction, main model for complex analysis
neo4j.strategySameAsMainHint: Use the main LLM for all memory operations
neo4j.strategyIndependentHint: Configure separate models for memory operations
neo4j.autoCapture: Enable automatic memory capture from conversations?
neo4j.autoRecall: Enable automatic memory recall before agent responses?
neo4j.switchQuestion: Switch to Neo4j memory plugin? (This will disable {plugin})
activated: Neo4j Memory Plugin is now the active memory system.
Previous memory plugin ({plugin}) has been disabled.
notActivated: Configuration saved but Neo4j memory is not active.
setupComplete: 1. Restart the gateway: openclaw gateway run
- Extract entities and relationships from conversations
- Store them in the Neo4j graph database
- Recall relevant memories in future conversations
openclaw memory-graph status          - Check plugin status

napcatqq.title: NapCatQQ Setup
description: NapCatQQ provides QQ messaging integration via the OneBot 11 protocol.
It requires a running NapCatQQ or compatible OneBot 11 adapter.
3. Get your access token if configured
connectionFailed: Please ensure NapCatQQ is running and the WebSocket URL is correct.
napcatqq.connectionOk: Connection test successful! NapCatQQ channel is ready.
setupComplete: 1. Restart the gateway: openclaw gateway run
2. Send a message to your QQ bot to test

subagent.injectIntro: The following subagents are configured with their specialties:
subagent.injectUsageNote: **Usage**: When you need to use a subagent, first call the `available_subagents` tool to see the list of available subagents, then select the appropriate subagent for the task.
